mapper.select: select rn,postno,filename,likescount,postcontent from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC(seq_POSTNO_no) */ rownum rn,p.postno,pf.no,fs.filename,p.likescount,p.postcontent from postfiles pf join post p on p.postno=pf.postno and no in (select min(no) from postfiles group by postno) join files fs on pf.no=fs.no and rownum <= #{parameter1} + #{parameter2} order by likescount desc) WHERE rn > #{parameter1}
